EmailTemplate.name: Chaser Level 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Chaser Level 1 - 15 days overdue
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good morning/afternoon,
I hope you are well,
Please find attached a copy of your outstanding invoices with us, We hope you have everything you need to be able to process these however, if not, please let us know and we shall be happy to assist further.
We look forward to receiving payment, but should you have any queries please let us know.
Kind regards
